title: Man Mage
description:
A man who wields magical powers derived from supernatural or occult sources.

May also be referred to as a wizard, warlock, or sorcerer.
apple_vendor_description: This magical figure on Apple devices is a powerful male mage, adorned in flowing robes with a deep, rich purple hue that exhibits Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading.  A mystical staff is held aloft, emanating soft, luminous light thanks to realistic lighting effects.  The expression on his face is one of focused determination, evoking fantasy, enchantment, and the pursuit of arcane knowledge within digital conversations.
